general.defaultMetaDescription: Discover high-quality garden furniture and accessories at Your Garden Eden.

seo.defaultPageTitle: Your Garden Eden | Garden Furniture, Decor & More
seo.productListTitle: {{categoryName}} - Buy Garden Furniture & more online | Your Garden Eden

header.loginForWishlist: Please log in to use the wishlist

nav.furniture.description: Discover high-quality garden furniture for your balcony & terrace ✓ Chairs ✓ Tables ✓ Lounges. Design your oasis now at Your Garden Eden!
nav.furniture.sofas.description: Discover comfortable & weatherproof garden sofas. Create pure coziness on your terrace. Buy online now at Your Garden Eden.
nav.furniture.chairs.description: Find versatile garden chairs online. Whether stacking, folding, or comfy garden armchairs – perfect for balcony & garden. Order now at Your Garden Eden.
nav.furniture.stools.description: Practical & stylish garden stools as flexible seating or side tables. Weatherproof materials & modern design. Discover now!
nav.furniture.seatingGroups.description: Comfortable seat cushions & pads for your garden furniture. Make yourself even more comfortable. Large selection of colors & sizes at Your Garden Eden.
nav.furniture.tables.description: Find the perfect garden table for social gatherings. From small balcony tables to large dining tables. Weatherproof & robust. Buy now!
nav.furniture.benches.description: Discover romantic & modern garden benches made of wood, metal, or polyrattan. The ideal place to linger. View now at Your Garden Eden.
nav.furniture.sunloungers.description: Pure relaxation with our comfortable sun & garden loungers. Adjustable, weatherproof, and stylish. Bring that holiday feeling home!
nav.furniture.beds.description: Luxurious garden beds & daybeds for ultimate outdoor relaxation. Transform your garden into a private wellness oasis.
nav.furniture.hammocks.description: Let your soul dangle! Discover our selection of hammocks & hanging chairs for the perfect relaxation spot in the garden.
nav.furniture.swings.description: The classic for cozy hours: Porch swings in modern designs. Robust, comfortable, and a real eye-catcher. Now at Your Garden Eden.
nav.furniture.covers.description: Protect your garden furniture from wind & weather. High-quality, waterproof & breathable covers for tables, chairs & more.
nav.furniture.box.description: Create order with practical garden & cushion boxes. Waterproof & ideal for storing cushions & garden accessories.
nav.sunprotection.description: Optimal sun protection for your garden & balcony. Discover awnings, parasols & more in top quality at Your Garden Eden.
nav.sunprotection.awnings.description: Effective sun protection with style. Find the right awning for your terrace or balcony. Manual or electric. View now!
nav.sunprotection.umbrellas.description: Large selection of parasols. Whether it's a cantilever, market, or balcony parasol – you'll find the perfect shade provider with us.
nav.sunprotection.accessories.description: Everything for your parasol: Sturdy stands, protective covers, and other practical accessories for a secure stand & long life.
nav.water.description: Create an oasis of refreshment. From pools to ponds – everything for your water paradise in the garden at Your Garden Eden.
nav.water.pools.description: Cool off on hot days! Discover our above-ground & frame pools for quick swimming fun for the whole family. Buy online now.
nav.water.pondAccessories.description: Everything for a clear & healthy garden pond. Pumps, filters, lighting, and other pond accessories in top quality at Your Garden Eden.
nav.water.poolAccessories.description: The right accessories for untroubled swimming fun. From pool cleaners and filters to cover tarps. Discover pool accessories now.
nav.heating.description: Enjoy cozy evenings outdoors. Discover fire bowls, fireplaces & practical accessories for pleasant warmth in your garden.
nav.heating.fireplaces.description: Create a unique atmosphere with our fire bowls, fire pits & garden fireplaces. The perfect centerpiece for cozy evenings.
nav.heating.firewoodstorage.description: Store your firewood dry & stylishly. Discover our robust firewood racks in various sizes and designs.
nav.heating.heaters.description: Practical accessories for your fire pit. From spark guards to grill grates – make more out of your garden fire pit.
nav.gardenhelpers.description: Practical helpers for a well-kept garden. Discover garden tools, sheds & smart storage solutions at Your Garden Eden.
nav.gardenhelpers.tools.description: High-quality garden tools for every task. From lawnmowers to hedge trimmers – make gardening easier with the right tools.
nav.gardenhelpers.sheds.description: Create space and order. Robust garden sheds made of metal or wood for the safe storage of equipment, tools & bicycles.
nav.gardenhelpers.composters.description: Turn garden waste into valuable fertilizer. Find the right composter for your garden – from thermal to rapid composters.
nav.gardenhelpers.waterbutts.description: Collect valuable rainwater and protect the environment. Discover our selection of water butts & rain collectors.
nav.gardenhelpers.toolstorage.description: Organization made easy. Find smart solutions for storing your garden tools. From wall mounts to small tool sheds.
nav.deco.description: Set atmospheric accents in your garden. Discover unique garden decor & lighting for a magical ambiance.
nav.deco.lighting.description: Bring light into your garden! Atmospheric solar lights, LED spots, and outdoor lamps for a magical evening atmosphere.
nav.deco.audio.description: Enjoy your favorite music outdoors. Weatherproof outdoor & garden speakers for perfect sound at your next garden party.
nav.deco.decoration.description: Give your garden a personal touch. From elegant sculptures and climbing aids to decorative planters.
nav.deco.rugs.description: Make your terrace even cozier. Robust & weatherproof outdoor rugs in many designs and colors. Now at Your Garden Eden.
nav.deco.christmas.description: Enchant your home at Christmas time. Discover atmospheric Christmas decorations for indoors & outdoors.
nav.plants.description: Everything for a green paradise. From greenhouses to planters – create the best conditions for your plants.
nav.plants.greenhouses.description: Extend the gardening season! Protect your plants and optimize propagation with a high-quality greenhouse from Your Garden Eden.
nav.plants.raisedbeds.description: Gardening at a comfortable height. Discover our selection of raised beds made of wood, metal, or plastic. Ideal for vegetables, herbs, and flowers.
nav.plants.tables.description: Easy on your back and practical: Our potting tables are the ideal workspace for all your planting and repotting tasks in the garden.
nav.plants.stands.description: Showcase your favorite plants in style. Discover flower stands & plant shelves for indoors and outdoors.
nav.plants.artificial.description: Permanently green with no maintenance. Discover our high-quality and deceptively real artificial plants for balcony, terrace, and living areas.
nav.plants.protection.description: Effectively protect your plants from pests and weather. From plant tunnels to winter protection – everything for healthy plants.
nav.plants.planters.description: The perfect pot for every plant. Discover our large selection of planters and flower pots in many sizes, shapes, and materials.
nav.plants.trellises.description: Give your climbing plants the support they need. Sturdy and decorative trellises, espaliers, and rose arches for a magnificent wall of flowers.
nav.plants.irrigation.description: Ensure an optimal water supply. From garden hoses to automatic irrigation systems – for a healthy, green lawn.
nav.playfun.description: The play paradise for your garden. Discover high-quality play equipment like swings, sandpits, and trampolines for happy children.
nav.playfun.sandpits.description: Creative fun for the little ones. Robust sandpits made of wood or plastic, some with roofs and seating. Discover now!
nav.playfun.playcastles.description: Adventure in your own garden! Discover our play towers & play castles with slides, swings, and climbing opportunities.
nav.playfun.swings.description: Swinging makes you happy! Find the right kids' swing for your garden – from baby swings to swing sets for multiple children.
nav.playfun.trampolines.description: Jumping fun for the whole family! Safe and stable garden trampolines in various sizes including safety nets. Now at Your Garden Eden.
nav.playfun.accessories.description: Everything for your trampoline. From ladders and safety pads to ground anchors – find the right accessories for more safety and durability here.

categoryDescriptions.furniture: Transform your outdoor area into a second living room. Whether it's a cozy lounge corner, a stylish dining set for social evenings, or a comfortable sun lounger for relaxing – here you will find durable and weatherproof garden furniture that combines design with comfort.
categoryDescriptions.furniture_sofas: Make yourself truly comfortable outdoors. Our garden sofas offer the highest seating comfort and are made of robust, weatherproof materials that can withstand any weather. Ideal for relaxing hours alone or with friends.
categoryDescriptions.furniture_chairs: The perfect seat for every occasion. From practical folding chairs for spontaneous guests to ergonomically shaped garden armchairs for long-lasting comfort – find the right chair for your needs and your style here.
categoryDescriptions.furniture_stools: Flexible, practical, and stylish: Our garden stools are true all-rounders. Use them as an extra seat, a comfortable footrest, or a practical side table for your favorite book and cool drinks.
categoryDescriptions.furniture_seatingGroups: The final touch for pure coziness. With our high-quality seat cushions and pads, your garden furniture becomes a comfort zone. Weatherproof fabrics and stylish designs ensure a welcoming atmosphere and comfortable hours outdoors.
categoryDescriptions.furniture_tables: The garden table is the heart of every terrace and balcony. This is where people eat, laugh, and live. Discover our variety of outdoor tables – from compact bistro tables to extendable tables for the whole family.
categoryDescriptions.furniture_benches: A garden bench invites you to dream and linger. Whether classic wood under a tree or modern as part of your lounge group – find the perfect place for a little break from everyday life with us.
categoryDescriptions.furniture_sunloungers: Soak up the sun and let your soul dangle. Our sun loungers are designed for maximum relaxation. Adjustable backrests, comfortable cushions, and robust materials turn your garden into a private wellness oasis.
categoryDescriptions.furniture_beds: Pure luxury for your outdoor area. Our exclusive garden beds and daybeds offer space for relaxing hours for two or alone. Treat yourself to this exceptional comfort and turn your garden into a holiday resort.
categoryDescriptions.furniture_hammocks: Float away from everyday life. A hammock is the epitome of relaxation. Whether stretched between two trees or in its own frame – find your personal piece of happiness with us.
categoryDescriptions.furniture_swings: The modern interpretation of a classic. Our porch swings combine nostalgic charm with contemporary design and high comfort. The perfect place for gentle swinging and relaxed conversations.
categoryDescriptions.furniture_covers: Protect your investment. With our custom-fit and breathable protective covers, your garden furniture will remain beautiful for years. Easy to handle, effective in protecting against rain, sun, and dirt.
categoryDescriptions.furniture_box: Where to put the cushions and toys? Our waterproof and robust garden boxes create order in no time. They are not only practical but also look good.
categoryDescriptions.sunprotection: Enjoy the summer, but protect yourself optimally from excessive sun exposure. Our sun protection solutions combine functionality with attractive design and ensure pleasant shady spots in your garden or on your balcony.
categoryDescriptions.sunprotection_awnings: The awning is the flexible shade provider for your terrace. With a flick of the wrist or the push of a button, you can create a spacious, protected area. Our models impress with high-quality fabrics and stable constructions.
categoryDescriptions.sunprotection_umbrellas: The classic parasol is and remains an indispensable companion for the summer. With us, you will find a large selection from the practical cantilever parasol, which offers you full flexibility, to the robust market parasol for the large table.
categoryDescriptions.sunprotection_accessories: The right accessories are crucial for a secure stand and a long life for your parasol. Discover suitable parasol stands, ground sleeves, and weatherproof protective covers with us.
categoryDescriptions.water: Water in the garden is a source of joy and relaxation. Whether as a refreshing pool on hot days or as a calming garden pond – create your own little water paradise.
categoryDescriptions.water_pools: Turn your garden into an outdoor pool! Our above-ground pools are quick to set up and offer the whole family a welcome cool-down and lots of fun on hot summer days.
categoryDescriptions.water_pondAccessories: A healthy pond is a fascinating biotope. With our pumps, filters, and lighting systems, you ensure clear water and create optimal living conditions for plants and animals.
categoryDescriptions.water_poolAccessories: Keep your pool water clean and inviting. Our pool accessories, from skimmers and brushes to dosing floats and filter systems, make pool care a breeze.
categoryDescriptions.heating: Extend the evenings outdoors with the pleasant warmth of a real fire. Our fire pits create an unparalleled atmosphere of coziness and invite you to get together.
categoryDescriptions.heating_fireplaces: The crackling of an open fire is pure magic. Our fire bowls and garden fireplaces are the safe and stylish centerpiece for unforgettable evenings with friends and family under the stars.
categoryDescriptions.heating_firewoodstorage: Well-stored wood burns best. With our firewood racks, you not only keep your firewood dry but also display it decoratively.
categoryDescriptions.heating_heaters: Make more of your fire pit. With a matching grill grate, the fire bowl becomes a barbecue area, and a spark guard provides additional safety. Discover our practical accessories.
categoryDescriptions.gardenhelpers: A beautiful garden needs care – and the right helpers. Our selection of garden tools and storage solutions makes the work easier and helps you keep things tidy.
categoryDescriptions.gardenhelpers_tools: Good work requires good tools. Whether you are mowing the lawn, trimming the hedge, or digging the flower bed – with us, you will find high-quality and durable garden tools that make your work easier.
categoryDescriptions.gardenhelpers_sheds: No more chaos. A garden shed is the perfect solution to store garden tools, bicycles, and equipment safely and dryly. Find the right model for your space needs with us.
categoryDescriptions.gardenhelpers_composters: Close the cycle of nature. With a composter, you turn kitchen and garden waste into nutrient-rich humus – the best fertilizer for your plants.
categoryDescriptions.gardenhelpers_waterbutts: Using precious rainwater not only saves you money but also protects the environment. Our water butts come in many shapes and sizes, also as a decorative element for your garden.
categoryDescriptions.gardenhelpers_toolstorage: A place for every tool. With clever storage systems like wall mounts and small tool sheds, you always have your garden tools handy and safely stowed away.
categoryDescriptions.deco: Decoration is what turns a garden into a personal paradise. With the right accessories and atmospheric lighting, you create a unique atmosphere and give your outdoor area character.
categoryDescriptions.deco_lighting: When dusk falls, it's time for garden lighting. Use solar lights, LED spots, or string lights to set targeted accents and bathe your garden in a magical light.
categoryDescriptions.deco_audio: The perfect playlist for the barbecue party or relaxing sounds for chilling out. Our weatherproof outdoor speakers bring excellent sound to your garden – without any cable clutter.
categoryDescriptions.deco_decoration: Show your personality. With selected decorative objects such as sculptures, wind chimes, or garden stakes, you give your garden that certain something and create individual eye-catchers.
categoryDescriptions.deco_rugs: An outdoor rug connects indoors with outdoors and creates a homely atmosphere on the terrace and balcony. Our garden rugs are robust, easy to care for, and a stylish splash of color.
categoryDescriptions.deco_christmas: Let your garden shine in winter too. With our Christmas decorations for the outdoor area, from luminous figures to string lights, you create a festive and inviting atmosphere.
categoryDescriptions.plants: Plants are the soul of every garden. Whether you are growing vegetables, cultivating flowers, or simply enjoying the green – with us, you will find everything you need for successful propagation and care.
categoryDescriptions.plants_greenhouses: Create optimal growing conditions and extend the gardening season. A greenhouse protects your sensitive plants from the weather and allows for earlier sowing and a richer harvest.
categoryDescriptions.plants_raisedbeds: Gardening in a raised bed is comfortable, easy on the back, and often more productive. Due to better soil warming and nutrient supply, vegetables, herbs, and flowers thrive.
categoryDescriptions.plants_tables: The ideal workspace for every gardener. On a potting table, you can comfortably repot, prick out, and sow while standing, without having to bend down. All important utensils are always within reach.
categoryDescriptions.plants_stands: Put your most beautiful potted plants in the spotlight. With flower stands and plant shelves, you create different levels and design a lively, green oasis on the balcony, terrace, or in the house.
categoryDescriptions.plants_artificial: Evergreen and absolutely low-maintenance. Our high-quality artificial plants are the perfect solution for anyone with little time or for locations where real plants would not thrive. Deceptively real and always beautiful.
categoryDescriptions.plants_protection: Help your plants stay healthy and strong. With the right plant protection, from snail fences and fleeces to insect hotels, you support the natural balance in your garden.
categoryDescriptions.plants_planters: Every plant needs the right home. Our planters are not only functional but also an important design element. Find the perfect pot with us that showcases your plants optimally.
categoryDescriptions.plants_trellises: Support your climbing artists. Trellises give climbing roses, clematis, or vines the necessary support and transform bare walls and fences into magnificent flowering works of art.
categoryDescriptions.plants_irrigation: A reliable water supply is the be-all and end-all for a healthy garden. Discover our smart irrigation solutions that save you time and work and supply your plants optimally.
categoryDescriptions.playfun: A garden is also an adventure playground. With our safe and tested play equipment, you create a place for your children where they can run wild, be creative, and collect unforgettable childhood memories.
categoryDescriptions.playfun_sandpits: Baking cakes, building castles, burying treasures – a sandpit is a paradise for little explorers. Our models are robust, safe, and promote your child's creativity and motor skills.
categoryDescriptions.playfun_playcastles: Conquer, climb, slide! A play tower transforms any garden into a knight's castle or a pirate ship. With various modules such as slides and swings, long-lasting fun is guaranteed.
categoryDescriptions.playfun_swings: The feeling of flying is priceless. A swing in the garden is a classic that never goes out of style and brings joy to children of all ages. Find the right model for your needs with us.
categoryDescriptions.playfun_trampolines: Jumping makes you happy and promotes coordination. Our garden trampolines meet the highest safety standards and guarantee carefree jumping fun for young and old.
categoryDescriptions.playfun_accessories: Make your trampoline even safer and more durable. With the right accessories like a ladder for easy entry or ground anchors for a storm-proof stand, you are perfectly equipped.

home.title: Garden Furniture & Decor for Your Dream Garden | Your Garden Eden
home.description: Discover exclusive garden furniture, plants, and decor for your balcony, terrace & garden. Design your personal oasis of well-being now with Your Garden Eden.
home.subtitle: Find everything you need for your green oasis
home.introQuote: We believe that every garden, every terrace, and every balcony has the potential to be a personal paradise.
home.introTextFollowup: That's why we offer you a carefully selected collection of high-quality garden furniture, inspiring decoration, and useful garden helpers. Whether you're looking for a cozy lounge corner, a stylish outdoor dining area, or just green accents – you'll find it here. Design the garden you've always dreamed of with us.
home.videoNotSupported: Unfortunately, your browser does not support HTML5 videos.
home.noBellers: No bestsellers are available at the moment.

maintenance.title: Information on current maintenance work
maintenance.paragraph1: We are currently optimizing our online shop for you! Orders are still possible without any problems. Should minor inconveniences occur unexpectedly, we ask for your understanding.
maintenance.paragraph2: As a small thank you for your patience, you will receive a 5% discount on your current purchase.

cartDiscount.title: Welcome to our improved shop!
cartDiscount.paragraph1: We are currently developing our online shop for you! As a thank you for your understanding if minor inconveniences occur during this phase, we are giving you a 5% discount on your order.
cartDiscount.paragraph2: Just click on 'Apply discount' to activate the benefit immediately. We are working hard to offer you the best possible shopping experience soon.
cartDiscount.couponCodeLabel: Your coupon code (will be applied automatically):
